comments.body:
The `license_file` isn't included in the source distribution, so please package it manually:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

I see that you put in a PR upstream (https://github.com/scottgigante/tasklogger/pull/2). Please add a link to the PR as a comment in the `meta.yaml` as a reminder to check if it's been fixed for future releases

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  license: GPL-2.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An extension to the core python logging library for logging the beginning and completion of tasks and subtasks

@@ -1,1 +11,15 @@
build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vvv "
  noarch: python
